rev.comment: /* Personal issues */ Cleaned up and removed POV. Still needs more details...?

Line 177: Line 177:
===Personal issues===
===Personal issues===
â
Former Google sales executive Christina Elwell, promoted to national sales director at Google in late 2003, accused her Google supervisor of discrimination againest her [http://news.com.com/Google+hit+with+job+discrimination+lawsuit/2100-1030_3-5807158.html?tag=nl] after informing him of her pregnancy. After the loss of 3 of her quadruplets due to the stressful circumstances created by Google Elwell sued the company. She also refused an offer from Shona Brown, Google Vice President of Business Operations, to reinstate her to a "low-level operations position".
+
Former Google sales executive Christina Elwell, promoted to national sales director at Google in late 2003, accused her supervisor of discrimination against her ([http://news.com.com/Google+hit+with+job+discrimination+lawsuit/2100-1030_3-5807158.html?tag=nl see here]) after informing him of her pregnancy. After the loss of 3 of her quadruplets, which she claimed was due to the stressful circumstances created by Google, Elwell sued the company. She also refused an offer from Shona Brown, Google Vice President of Business Operations, to reinstate her to a "low-level operations position".
===Partiality===
===Partiality===
